AccessAnalyzerEnabled.^description: AWS IAM Access Analyzer is not enabled. Access Analyzer helps identify resources in your organization and accounts that are shared with an external entity. This lets you identify unintended access to your resources and data, which is a security risk.

AnalyzerStatus.^description: Access Analyzer is not in active status. An inactive analyzer will not generate findings for new or updated resources.

PublicFindings.^description: Access Analyzer has identified resources that are publicly accessible. Public access to resources can lead to unintended data exposure and should be reviewed immediately.

AccessFindings.^description: Access Analyzer has identified resources with external access. These findings should be reviewed to ensure the access is intended and follows the principle of least privilege.
